heading: HR00539
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD AND THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY, TO JOINTLY INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE DELAYED IRRIGATION PROJECTS UNDER THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA), WHICH AGGRAVATED THE ALREADY ABJECT SITUATION OF THE FILIPINO FARMERS
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.; CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.;
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2019-12-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00539
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD AND THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY, TO JOINTLY INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE DELAYED IRRIGATION PROJECTS UNDER THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA), WHICH AGGRAVATED THE ALREADY ABJECT SITUATION OF THE FILIPINO FARMERS
